statements: SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT touchpoint, interaction_type FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT interaction_details FROM customer_interactions WHERE touchpoint = 'Email' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, touchpoint FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Purchase' LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type LIKE '%Complaint%';
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date, touchpoint, interaction_type, interaction_details FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_date, touchpoint FROM customer_interactions WHERE touchpoint = 'Email' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Complaint' AND interaction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type IN ('Query', 'Feedback') ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT customer_id, touchpoint, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id > 50 AND touchpoint IN ('Phone', 'Email') ORDER BY customer_id, interaction_date ASC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp, interaction_details FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Purchase' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;

SELECT c.customer_name, i.interaction_type, i.interaction_timestamp FROM customers c JOIN interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id WHERE c.email_address LIKE '%gmail.com%' ORDER BY i.interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE phone IS NULL;
SELECT id, name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;

SELECT interaction_id, timestamp, interaction_type FROM interactions ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, timestamp FROM interactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM touchpoints WHERE channel='Email';
SELECT id, name, email, phone FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, timestamp FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type='Purchase' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;

SELECT customer_id, name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE name LIKE '%John%';

SELECT customer_id, interaction_date FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Purchase' AND interaction_channel = 'Online';
